content: is there such a thing as  Geeky Christmas decorations eg double helix?

Yes, there are many geeky Christmas decorations available, including ones inspired by science and technology. Double helix ornaments are one example of geeky Christmas decorations, particularly for those with an interest in biology or genetics. Other examples include ornaments shaped like robots, spaceships, video game characters, math equations, or science symbols. These can be found online on websites that specialize in geeky or science-themed merchandise, as well as at specialty stores or holiday pop-up shops.
